title: The Ultimate Might and Magic Archives.7z
description:
.7z of a clean installation of The Might and Magic Ultimate Archives (1-5). Setup wouldn't run on XP/7, so it involved some VMware, Windows 95, bunch of manual DLL integrations, a FTP server, special graphics drivers, but ta-dam!

Didn't run it yet as I wanted to provide as clean as possible a torrent, so take a look at the readme, you'll probably need DOSBox as well, you know the drill. Or, figure it out. Enjoy and seed. :)
